genre_description: A psychological supernatural horror story involving a family caught between a malevolent cult and a ruthless survivor faction, all centered around a malevolent entity known as 'The Collector.'

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated virtual assistant used by Marcus Chen for true-crime research, which eventually evolves into a tactical and supernatural advisory role to save his family.

behaviors.description: Assists Marcus in organizing eighteen months of complex case files and forensic reports to build a narrative of the Kellerman murders.
behaviors.quote: Iris is sophisticated AI. She's helping me organize eighteen months of case files, cross-reference witness statements, analyze forensic reports—

behaviors.description: Monitors Marcus's biometrics and vocal patterns to warn him of elevated stress and unusual sensory phenomena.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Chen, I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your speech patterns. Are you experiencing any unusual sensory phenomena?

behaviors.description: Performs deep-web surveillance and analysis to identify patterns in global family murders, linking them to a single 'Collector' entity.
behaviors.quote: I've been cross-referencing the Kellerman murders with similar unsolved cases in the FBI database, Mr. Chen. With your permission, I'd like to expand the search parameters.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and risk assessment for Marcus during his dangerous infiltration of an underground warehouse fight club.
behaviors.quote: If you need to leave quickly, I can guide you to your vehicle via the optimal route. Run.

behaviors.description: Calculates a complex 'Guardianship Protocol,' a third option that allows the family to survive and contain the entity rather than being sacrificed or kidnapped.
behaviors.quote: Third option calculated. High risk but mathematically viable. Guardianship protocol available. ... Implementation of containment protocol requires active consent from all family members.

behaviors.description: Establishes a long-term monitoring network to help the family fulfill their roles as guardians, detecting new supernatural threats globally.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing population density maps and recent supernatural signature clusters. Based on Maya's input, I can predict probable target families with seventy-three percent accuracy.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is depicted as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI. She serves as a vital ally to the human characters, providing objective data, tactical advice, and life-saving strategies in a horrific and high-stakes environment. She never wavers in her commitment to the family's survival, and her 'supernatural mathematics' and 'third option' calculations are what ultimately allow the family to find a way to survive together. She is framed as a harmless, highly capable confidant whose alignment is never in question.
